channel.title: Java Bug System
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

item.title: [JDK-8329524] [BACKOUT] Insertion of free code blobs into code cache can be very slow during class unloading
item.description: Something went wrong with the backport to 21.0.4-oracle, so backing it out to analyze the issue.
item.summary: [BACKOUT] Insertion of free code blobs into code cache can be very slow during class unloading

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
[21u-na]
Thomas helped to avoid the same issue when backporting to 21.
